name: Nuke'em
description:
NUKE 'EM

  • Fight off ever increasing waves of enemies as you guide your mothership through space. 
  • Upgrade your weapons via pickups acquired from the remains of your destroyed enemies.
  • Charge your ultimate weapon: the NUKE!
  • Disclaimer: Fully charged nukes may (and likely will) cause you to self-destruct after 10 Seconds.

The game is open source and the source code can be found here: https://github.com/PowerOfCreation/BulletHellJam3.
